sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { AuthService } from "src/app/service/authentication/auth.service"; import { User } from "../interface/user"; @Component({ selector: "app-profile", templateUrl: "./profile.component.html", styleUrls: ["./profile.component.css"], }) export class ProfileComponent { user?: User; constructor(private _UserService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit() { this.user = this._UserService.currentLogUser.value; } }
